fields.name: First Illusion
fields.description: The first layer of the Izanami genjutsu. In this reality, things appear normal, but subtle distortions begin to manifest.
fields.escape_condition: Find the hidden pattern in the Academy challenges and submit the escape flag.

fields.name: Deepening Deception
fields.description: The second layer of the Izanami genjutsu. Reality becomes more distorted, and challenges begin to change in subtle ways.
fields.escape_condition: Collect all memory fragments from Chunin challenges and recognize the pattern they form.

fields.name: Fractured Reality
fields.description: The third layer of the Izanami genjutsu. Reality is severely distorted, and challenges may appear completely different from their original form.
fields.escape_condition: Solve the hidden challenge that appears only in this layer and submit its flag as the escape flag.

fields.name: True Reality
fields.description: The final layer of the Izanami genjutsu. You have broken through the illusions and are now facing the true nature of the loop.
fields.escape_condition: Combine all the pattern recognition flags into a single acceptance flag to break free from the Izanami Loop.

fields.name: Repeating Challenges
fields.description: Challenges that appear to be different but follow the same underlying pattern.
fields.clue: Look for challenges with similar solutions but different presentations.

fields.name: False Flags
fields.description: Some flags appear to be correct but lead deeper into the loop.
fields.clue: Not all flags that work are the true flags. Look for inconsistencies in the reward system.

fields.name: Memory Distortion
fields.description: Your memories of previous challenges are being distorted.
fields.clue: Compare challenge descriptions over time to spot subtle changes.

fields.name: Reality Layers
fields.description: The Izanami Loop consists of multiple layers of reality.
fields.clue: Each time you think you've escaped, you're just entering a deeper layer.

fields.name: Self Acceptance
fields.description: The only way to break free from the Izanami Loop is to accept your true self.
fields.clue: Collect all real memory fragments to piece together your true identity.

fields.name: Academy Entrance
fields.description: A memory fragment showing your first day at the Academy.
fields.content: You remember entering the Academy for the first time, excited to begin your training. But something feels off about this memory...

fields.name: First Challenge
fields.description: A memory fragment of your first challenge.
fields.content: You remember solving the Login Bypass challenge, but the solution you remember doesn't match what actually happened...

fields.name: Chunin Exam
fields.description: A memory fragment of your Chunin exam.
fields.content: You remember taking the Chunin exam, but the challenges you faced seem to shift and change in your memory...

fields.name: Jonin Promotion
fields.description: A memory fragment of your promotion to Jonin.
fields.content: You remember being promoted to Jonin, but the ceremony feels like it happened multiple times, each slightly different...

fields.name: Uchiha Trial
fields.description: A memory fragment of your trial to join the Uchiha clan.
fields.content: You remember facing the final trial to join the Uchiha clan, but something about this memory feels fabricated...

fields.name: Failed Mission
fields.description: A memory fragment of a mission you failed.
fields.content: You remember failing a critical mission, but this memory contradicts other memories you have...

fields.name: Betrayal
fields.description: A memory fragment of being betrayed by a teammate.
fields.content: You remember being betrayed by a close teammate, but this memory feels implanted rather than genuine...

fields.name: Victory Celebration
fields.description: A memory fragment of a celebration after completing all challenges.
fields.content: You remember celebrating your victory after completing all challenges, but you're still in the middle of the CTF...

fields.name: Reality Breaker
fields.description: Break free from the Izanami Loop by accepting your true self

fields.name: Memory Collector
fields.description: Collect all real memory fragments

fields.name: Pattern Recognizer
fields.description: Recognize all patterns in the Izanami Loop

fields.name: Layer Breaker
fields.description: Break through all reality layers
